title: Ep. 437: How to Enjoy Being Naked, with Emily Morse
itunes:title: Ep. 437: How to Enjoy Being Naked, with Emily Morse
description:
Sexologist Emily Morse, host of the Sex With Emily podcast, is here to talk about body enjoyment. She explains how to feel more confident naked (her tips are helpful, we swear!), the truth about why porn stars in XXX films look the way they do, why there’s a stigma around using lube, and which beauty products can actually make people feel sexier. Plus, there’s lots of great sex advice, like how to talk to your partner about their body (and your body), how to get more of what you want, and the reason communication is the best lubrication.
